Refridgerator
description: Find a spot behind the butter or beside the milk. Nobody will look here!

message: On top of a tree branch
description: Even if the leaves haven't started to grow, a branch is a perfect spot to hide an egg. Just make sure to balance it so it doesn't fall.

message: Underneath a bush
description: Just give it a roll underneath the bush and it will be hard to find. Just don't let it roll back out!

message: Under the bench or table
description: If you put it underneath a bench or table, it might not draw much attention.

message: In a crack in the pavement
description: A colorful egg might be hard to hide, but a yellow or green one might blend in with grass or paint on the street.

message: Side of the walkway
description: The side of a walkway is a good place to hide an egg. Everyone will be so busy running to find them, they might go right by it!

message: In a cabinet
description: A cabinet is a great place to hide an egg. Just don't forget about it else you will find it over the summer when it might be spoiled!

message: On top of a book in the bookshelf
description: Try and find a book the same color as the easter egg, and it will blend in on the shelf.

message: On top of the bathroom sink
description: Why not hide it in the bathroom? It's a safe place to hide an won't be the first place to look!

message: Underneath a bush
description: Just give it a roll underneath the bush and it will be hard to find. Just don't let it roll back out!

message: Behind the mailbox
description: Finding places outside that you can't see easily is tough, but behind the mailbox will be a good spot that won't get found right away!

message: At the base of the trashcan or recycling container
description: At the base of the trashcan or recycling container will be good, especially if it is a colorful container.

message: Side of the walkway
description: The side of a walkway is a good place to hide an egg. Everyone will be so busy running to find them, they might go right by it!

message: In the plant pot
description: What a good place to hide an egg. Inside the pot of a plant the egg may look like a large rock, and blend right in!

message: Under the lamp
description: Under the lamp is a good place to hide the egg where it won't get found.

message: On the window sill
description: A window sill is a great place for hiding easter eggs. It might fit behind a drape, and not be in clear sight.

message: In the plant pot
description: What a good place to hide an egg. Inside the pot of a plant the egg may look like a large rock, and blend right in!

message: Under a rug
description: Placing an egg under the rug is a good spot to hide, especially if it is along furniture. Just don't step on it!

message: In the thick grass
description: Thick spring grass is a good way to hide an egg, especially if everyone is running around and not looking down.

message: In a hole in the yard
description: The grass might not be tall enough to hide, but finding a hole that partially buries the egg should be good.

message: In the carpet along the wall
description: Thick carpet is a great place to hide an egg where it can't be seen from across the room.

message: Next to the trash can
description: Just placing it at the base of a trash can can be an effective spot for hiding eggs.
